languages.text: "Поговаривают, что Теодора хотела видеть своим наследником кого-то другого... Вздор! Есть лишь один истинный Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Поговаривают, что Теодора хотела видеть своим наследником кого-то другого... Вздор! Есть лишь один истинный Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Поговаривают, что Теодора хотела видеть своим наследником кого-то другого... Вздор! Есть лишь один истинный Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "It is said that Theodora wanted to appoint someone else as her heir... Absurd! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
"It is said that Theodora wanted to appoint someone else as her heir... Absurd! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
"Theodora is said to have sought to appoint someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
"Theodora is said to have sought to appoint someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
"People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."
"People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「人々はシオドーラは後継者として他の誰かを任命するつもりだったと言っている…バカな！真の自由開拓者はひとりしかいない」
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「人々はシオドーラは後継者として他の誰かを任命するつもりだったと言っている…バカな！真の自由開拓者はひとりしかいない」

languages.text: “有人说，西奥多拉曾打算让其他人接她的班……简直是一派胡言！正统的继承人只有一位，那就是现任的行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “有人说，西奥多拉曾打算让其他人接她的班……简直是一派胡言！正统的继承人只有一位，那就是现任的行商浪人。”

languages.text: « À en croire la rumeur, Théodora voulait désigner un autre héritier... Balivernes ! Il n'y a qu'{mf|un seul|une seule} véritable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « À en croire la rumeur, Théodora voulait désigner un autre héritier... Balivernes ! Il n'y a qu'{mf|un seul|une seule} véritable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «Hay quienes dicen que Theodora quería nombrar a otro como heredero... ¡Tonterías! Hay {mf|un único heredero|una única heredera} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Hay quienes dicen que Theodora quería nombrar a otro como heredero... ¡Tonterías! Hay {mf|un único heredero|una única heredera} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Die Leute sagen, dass Theodora einen anderen Nachfolger verkünden wollte ... Unsinn! Es gibt nur {mf|einen wahren Freihändler|eine wahre Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora wollte angeblich jemand anderen zu ihrem Erben ernennen ... Unsinn! Es gibt nur {mf|einen wahren Freihändler|eine wahre Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Theodora'nın istediği vâris başkasıymış... Zırva! Sahih Hür Tacir, bir ve tektir."
languages.original_text: "People are saying that Theodora wanted to name someone else as her heir... Nonsense! There is only one true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora'nın istediği vâris başkasıymış... Zırva! Sahih Hür Tacir bir ve tektir."
